attributes.bio: I've been with Drama.gg/Winterhoax for 3 years. I've been a proud donator to Drama.gg. I also have a secret fan club hehehehehe.

attributes.contentHtml: Jen They wouldnt give me paper work if you go to court they mailed it dont lie because its on the internet it wouldnt be on the Juvenile System your 18 Now dumb ass
